children.value: A nuxt module for simplifying the use of
The module settings can be seen on the page
Note: Below are the minimum instructions. See full instructions for using the plugin

props.code:
<!-- your script code -->

<template>
  <!-- your code -->

  <NuxtNotifications position="bottom left" :speed="500" />
</template>

<!-- your script code -->

<template>
  <!-- your code -->

  <AppNotifications position="bottom left" :speed="500" />
</template>

<script setup>
  const { notify } = useNotification();

  function onClick() {
    notify({
      title: "Title",
      text: "Hello notify!",
    });
  }
</script>

<template>
  <button @click="onClick">Show notify</button>
</template>
